entry.title: Welcome.
entry.content: Department of Computer Science and Engineering.

entry.title: Courses.
entry.content:
This is the first blog post detailing the topics and the instructors who will be taking them up.

Topics.

The topics include.:

SL No. Topic Instructor
01 Internet of Things , AI and Machine Learning ( Smart Computing) Thyagaraju G S
02 Raspberry Pi and Python Programming Language Arjun K
04 Information and Network Security (Cyber Security, Web App Security, Data Security, IoT Security Cloud Security, Ethical Hacking ) Thyagaraju G S
05 Mobile Application Development Amith K S
06 Web Designing and Development Amith K S
07 “Fundamentals of Computer Network” & “Wireless Sensor Networking” Raghavendra Patil.

Activities:

  1. Technical Talks
  2. Seminars, Workshop
  3. Training Programs
  4. Summer Term and Winter Term Courses
  5. Projects Design and Implementation
  6. Publication of Research Papers and Patents
  7. Consultancy
  8. Entrepreneurship
  9. Internship
  10. Conference
  11. Competitions

Want to see something else added? send a mail to sdmitiot@gmail.com.
